text: Man - Woman Wanted () is a 1973 Polish comedy movie directed by Stanisław Bareja and starring Wojciech Pokora, Jolanta Bohdal, Maria Chwalibóg, Wiesław Gołas. ==Other websites== * * Poszukiwany, poszukiwana at filmpolski.pl * Poszukiwany, poszukiwana at stopklatka.pl Category:1973 comedy movies Category:1973 LGBT movies Category:Polish comedy movies Category:Polish LGBT movies Category:Movies directed by Stanisław Bareja
title: Man – Woman Wanted
